articles.title: Measles misinformation taking hold amid outbreak: poll - Axios
articles.description: Most American adults report having heard or read some false claims about measles or the MMR vaccines.
articles.content:
Most American adults report having heard or read some false claims about measles or the measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine, according to a new poll out Wednesday.
